articles.title: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F: Critics split on Eddie Murphy's new film - BBC.com
articles.description: Many reviews praised the film for inspiring feelings of nostalgia, but some said it lacked energy.
articles.content:
Critics have given a mixed response to the fourth outing of Beverly Hills Cop, which sees Eddie Murphy and other cast members from the original 1984 film reunite.

articles.title: Suki Waterhouse Recalls Meeting Robert Pattinson, Says They “Really Planned” Pregnancy - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "One day we looked at each other and said, ‘Well, this is as ready as we’re going to be,'" the actress and singer said.
articles.content:
Actress and singer Suki Waterhouse is looking back on her meet-cute moment with Robert Pattinson as they recently welcomed a baby girl.
